page.title: 06LOCAL NEWSPAPER FOR N.S.
page.content: Our local newspaper{,The Galloway {Gazette,}is sold mainly in Galloway towns and villages but copies are sent all over Britain,from the North of Scotland to the South of England.There are three editions of the newspaper the Newton Stewart,the Stranraer and the Kirkcudbright editions.The Galloway Gazette,a weekly paper,priced 18p and dated for a Saturday,is sold in many places on the Friday and there is a big rush to buy it.It has belonged to the Brown family for a very long time.At present Mr Ian Brown is in charge as owner and manager.
